Node.definition: = action by which humans supervise, direct or oversee work (such as building or repairing) or worship (such as singing or playing instruments)
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► Levite responsible for temple music and praise in the time of David (דָּוִד)
= man; ◄ son of Berechiah (בֶּרֶכְיָהוּ) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► temple singer; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= a type of song (שִׁיר) probably to be accompanied by musical instruments
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= to make an effort to hear the words spoken by someone else

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= action where humans make an intensive effort to associate with a deity, to serve and worship him, and to get answers to questions

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship
= state in which humans and deities are unwilling to assent to a suggestion or proposal

Node.gloss: to comfort|to console|to reassure|to express sympathy|to bring relief
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities seek to make (other) humans feel relief after a time of grief, anxiety, or fear

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= action by which humans, animals, or objects produce a variety of sounds, often associated with animals, but also with natural phenomena like the waves of a stormy sea
= action by which humans produce inarticulate sounds expressing distress
= state in which humans are totally without inner strength; ◄ caused by physical or non physical suffering
= inner person of a human or celestial being, associated with emotions, such as joy, grief, worry, courage, anger, willingness, etc.

Node.gloss: to grasp|to take hold of (something)|to seize|to catch|to hold on (to something)
Node.definition: = to take hold of someone or something; humans typically do this with their hands and animals use their mouths; however, it is often extended to include inanimate objects (traps), personalized qualities (wisdom), emotions (anger, fear), or processes (time)
= folds of skin which cover the eye when it is closed
= folds of skin which cover the eye when it is closed

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans exercise their mind (לֵב) with regard to something
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind
= action by which humans play an instrument with strings, such as a lute (כִּנֹּור) or lyre (נֵבֶל) which can be for silent meditation or to accompany singing and dancing
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= action by which humans speak softly for themselves as if thinking out loud
= action by which humans exercise their minds ► in order to understand certain things or to make a plan
= inner person of a human or celestial being, associated with emotions, such as joy, grief, worry, courage, anger, willingness, etc.
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= action by which someone makes a conscious decision to dismiss a certain object, person, or deity as inadequate, faulty, or otherwise unacceptable
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= process by which an action is repeated or continued
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= to come to an end
poetic term: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, usually in the future

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= process by which an event comes to a completion
= words spoken by humans and deities
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

Node.gloss: to be gracious|to be kindly disposed|to be generous|to be merciful|to pity
Node.definition: see חנן (חנן)|= state in which humans or deities are favorably disposed to (other) humans, and act accordingly
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= particle linking two events and denoting that X takes places in order to establish whether Y is true or not; X is often elided, which turns the remainder of the phrase into a question, which is often rhetorical
literally: to close an event; hence: = causative action by which deities stop an event from happening
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke
= state in which humans feel compassion for others, ◄ caused by affection for that person and/or the lack of well being of that person; ► this feeling is usually translated into action

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= process by which humans are emotionally wounded
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
= an epithet for the God of Israel ◄ as the one who not only lives in the highest heavens but is also worthy of the highest honor

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind
= an activity performed by a person or deity
= short form of יהוה (יהוה) only found in poetic texts

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind
= action by which humans speak softly for themselves as if thinking out loud
= an activity performed by a person or deity
= action by which humans speak softly for themselves as if thinking out loud
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which a human being or deity has an elevated status, as a result of their authority, rank, wealth, or wisdom
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

Node.gloss: to make known|to show|to inform|to tell|to teach
Node.definition: = causative process by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to acquire information about (other) humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force

= causative action by which humans or deity deliver an individual or group of people from the power of someone else or from difficult circumstances, ► which usually implies that the one who performed the act of deliverance has the right to claim the ones he delivered for himself
= each of the two upper limbs of the body, including the shoulder and extending until the hand; ≈ directly associated with strength and power
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= man; ◄ eleventh son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and first son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► father of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) and Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) each founder of a tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

Node.gloss: to tremble|to be distressed|to be in anguish
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience strong fear and distress, ◄ compared to the state of mind of a woman in labor; ► often accompanied by physical side effects, like writhing, and trembling

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it

Node.gloss: to tremble|to shake|to quake|to be disturbed|to be perturbed|to be excited|to flutter
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects shake involuntarily; ◄ typically as a result of fear, insecurity, shock, excitement, or other emotions

= great body of water located around and under the surface of the earth; when the world was newly created this water used to cover the earth as well; the subterranean water comes up to the surface of the earth through springs
= process by which water is released in copious quantities
= mass of visible, condensed watery vapor floating in the air; ► producing rain; ≈ God is said to envelop himself with clouds

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it
literally: arrow; hence: = visible electric discharge between cloud and ground, shaped and moving like an arrow and considered to consist of fire
= process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

= ring or round disk with a rod (axle) running through its center or hub; either made as a solid piece of wood or a central hub connected with several spokes to an outher rim; ◄ made of wood and sometimes partly of iron; ► used to help vehicles move over the ground

Node.gloss: to cause to shine|to give light to|to light up|radiant|resplendent
Node.definition: = action that causes something to emit or to reflect light; ≈ associated with well being and wisdom
= process by which bright flashes of light are seen between clouds and the ground or within clouds, often accompanied by thunder; ≈ regarded as fire from heaven and arrows or spears from God
primarily used in poetry: = the earth as opposed to the sky, with special focus on the area that is inhabited by humans

Node.gloss: to tremble|to shake|to quake|to be disturbed|to be perturbed|to be excited|to flutter
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects shake involuntarily; ◄ typically as a result of fear, insecurity, shock, excitement, or other emotions

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
literally: road; hence: = action by which humans are travelling from one place to another
literally: path; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= the impression left by a foot or shoe on the ground
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd
literally: by the hand (of someone); hence: = process by which a certain event is carried out by an intermediary (person) or instrument (object)
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) brother of Moses (מֹשֶׁה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► first high priest (כֹּהֵן)
